name: Shadow Gauntlet
description:
A game made during my 2nd year of university in 2017. 

Shadow Gauntlet is a competitive 2-player local multiplayer side-scrolling race/platformer that pits a dog and a cat against each other as they race through a track filled with deadly traps.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Cat:                                                               Dog:

[A] - Left                                                  [←] - Left

[D] - Right                                               [→] - Right

[S] - Slide                                                 [RCtrl] - Slide

[Space] - Jump                                     [Enter] - Jump
